about_the_game:
Stepmom is a visual novel game for adults only. This game is about a guy who loves to masturbate. He has never had sex with a woman. He only saw it in his dreams. At some point, his stepmother caught him jerking off. She became his first woman!

This game tells the story of a guy who loves to masturbate very much. He has never had sex with a woman. He saw sex only in porn videos and dreams. One day he decides, as always, to masturbate. But he completely forgot that he gave the keys to his stepmother. She quietly came to his apartment and caught him jerking off. She was at a loss. But even more she was excited ... She also wanted sex and she became the first woman of the guy!

What awaits you in the game:
Lots of sex animations.
Realistic graphics.
Amazing music.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
